narrative.narrative: The first Midway Airlines operated from 1976-1991 out of Chicago Midway Airport. Their would be another from 1993-2003 but would be unrelated to this Midway. They served 40 destinations, 2 of these being in Canada and 3 in the Caribbean and the rest in the U.S. They had 64 DC-9's of several variations, 16 MD-80 types, and 16 737-200's. It had 3 subisidiaries, Midwest Metrolink, Express and Connection. It went bankrupt in 1991 and found no buyers.
